title: Table 678: annual social housing sales by scheme for England
publisher: Ministry for Housing, Communities and Local Government
description: The tables below provide statistics on the sales of social housing stock – whether owned by local authorities or private registered providers.

contacts.name: James Sampson, Katie Fulton, Andrew Shiels, Carley Bailie

datasetNotes: Data can be located by scrolling down to Social housing sales and clicking on the 678 table link
sizingNotes: Simple table structure though with simple subdimension and footnotes.
